brand.name: PacSun
brand.ethicalInfo1: PacSun is not taking adequate steps to ensure payment of a living wage for its workers.
brand.ethicalInfo2:
PacSun's environment rating is 'very poor'. It uses few eco-friendly materials. There is no evidence it has set a greenhouse gas emissions reduction target. There is no evidence it has taken meaningful action to reduce or eliminate hazardous chemicals. There is no evidence it implements water reduction initiatives.

Its labour rating is 'very poor'. It does not disclose where it final stage of production occurs. It traces some of its supply chain. There is no evidence it ensures payment of a living wage in its supply chain. It audits some of its supply chain. It does not disclose any policies or safeguards to protect suppliers and workers in its supply chain from the impacts of COVID-19.

Its animal rating is 'it's a start'. There is no evidence it has a policy to minimise the suffering of animals. It uses wool. It does not use leather, down, exotic animal hair, angora, fur or exotic animal skin. There is no evidence it traces any animal product to the first stage of production.

PacSun is rated 'We avoid' overall.
brand.positiveText: Dear PacSun, I love the style and features of your products, and also that you care about people, the planet and animals. Good On You!
brand.negativeText: Dear PacSun, I love the style and features of your products, but I'm concerned about the impact of your brand on workers, the environment and animals. Until you do better I'll be looking for alternative brands that meet my needs.
